attributes.action: Stop unskilled workers and their families coming to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to stop all overseas workers coming to the UK who are unskilled and will not bring economic benifit to the UK. They are coming in thick and fast and eating up all the jobs available and not helping the UK unemployment Rate

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
